1.author_name: AJ wants U 2 meet The CanMan!
choices: Finish last one & begin the next one. . .
1.content: . . .needs company. Why buy the cow. . .
1.title: One Finished & Another Started

11.content:
Why buy the cow...

...when Chick-Fil-A has the number 1 combo for under five bucks!

When in Rome...
11.title: Now that we didn't buy the cow...let's go

111.author_name: AJ wants U 2 meet The CanMan!
choices: Dive right in and get your feet wet!
111.content:
When in Rome. . .

. . .watch your behind, or it might get pinched (if you're a woman)!



Still waters. . .
111.title: Ouch!!!

1111.content:
Still waters...

...should be disturbed - cannonball!!

Honesty is...
1111.title: A Big Splash

11111.content:
Honesty is...

...Not being able to say what you want.

Open your mind...
11111.title: In All Honesty

111111.content:
Open your mind . . .
                   and let the sun shine in!

Penny wise but . . .
111111.title: And let the sun shine in!

1111111.author_name: AJ wants U 2 meet The CanMan!
1111111.content:
Penny wise but wondering why I'm almost out of wisdom.

A stitch in time...
1111111.title: Penny wise but . . .

choices: Your own: A stitch in time...
11111111.content:
This is where you finish one of these traditional wise sayings in a new and clever way and then start another one.
For example, you might find:

When the cat's away. . .

So, you'd finish that thought and start a new one, such as:

. . .there are no hairballs to clean up. A penny saved. . .


A stitch in time makes blood drop upon the tapestry of God. A skeleton in the closet...
11111111.title: Sewing party here

info.author_name: AJ wants U 2 meet The CanMan!
info.brief_description: Give a new twist to an old saying!
info.description:
This is where you finish one of these traditional wise sayings in a new and clever way and then start another one.   
For example, you might find:   

When the cat's away. . .  

So, you'd finish that thought and start a new one, such as:   

. . .there are no hairballs to clean up. A penny saved. . .  


******* ******* ******* ******* *******  

Speaking of which, I'm leaving for a few days and will be anxious to see what's been added by the time I return.   

Have Fun! 
AJ :)
